about.label: WHO WE ARE
about.title: Aries Marine & Engg. Services Pvt Ltd
about.description: Aries is the largest Engineering, Inspection & Maintenance firm in the Middle East. Founded by Dr. Sohan Roy in 1998, Aries Marine is the flagship brand of Aries Group, a world-class consortium of diversified independent firms. Headquartered in Sharjah, UAE, this ISO 9001:2015, ISO 14001:2015, ISO 29001:2020 & ISO 45001:2018 certified company has business branches in UAE, Angola, Azerbaijan, Bahrain, Brunei, China, Germany, Guyana, India, Indonesia, Kuwait, Madagascar, Malaysia, Nepal, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, South Africa, Turkey, UK, USA, Sri Lanka, Greece, Netherlands, Japan, Nigeria, Vietnam, Morocco.
